column4: Required! Text that will be shown next to the axis in the graph (preferably the same as in  the "Source organization(s)" field in the About-Sheet).

Link for target, when clicking source name in the graph. Preferably the same as in  the "Link to source organization" field in the About-Sheet, but can also be left blank to target the link back to the indicators about-page.
Required! Type "lin" for linear scale or "log" for logarithmic scale. Users will be able to change it in the graph.
